text.section: In this section, "facility" means a special psychiatric hospital or an acute general care hospital with separately identified inpatient psychiatric service.

section.section: The Secretary may inspect any document necessary to ensure compliance with this subsection and §§ 10-701 through 10-709 of this article.

If a hospital that is a facility fails to adopt and implement the policies and procedures required by this subsection or maintains a continuing pattern of conditions or practices in knowing violation of §§ 10-701 through 10-709 of this article, the Secretary may impose the following penalties, but only after the Secretary has satisfied the conditions in § 19-360 of this subtitle:
Delicensure of the specialty psychiatric hospital;
Delicensure of the separately identified psychiatric service of the acute general care hospital; or
A fine not to exceed $500 per day for each day the violation continues.
